examples.example: 我们不断地重复练习，只为把事情做到最好。

translate.english: We constantly repeat the practice only to do things to the best.

examples.example: 老师耐心地重复讲解知识点，以便同学们能更好地理解和掌握。

translate.english: The teacher patiently repeats to explain the knowledge points so that the students can better understand and master them.

examples.example: 我每天重复着积极的生活方式，让自己充满活力和阳光。

translate.english: I repeat the positive lifestyle every day to make myself full of vitality and sunshine.
